banana_details.description: Banana is a tropical fruit known for its elongated shape, sweet flavor, and creamy texture. It is one of the most widely consumed fruits globally.
banana_details.nutritional value: Bananas are rich in potassium, vitamin C, vitamin B6, and dietary fiber. They provide instant energy and support heart health.
banana_details.cultivation: Bananas are grown in tropical regions with warm climates and high humidity. They require well-drained, fertile soil and regular watering.
banana_details.varieties: Cavendish, Lady Finger (or Finger Banana), Plantain, Red Banana, Burro Banana

prerequisites.soil: Well-drained, fertile soil with organic matter content
prerequisites.climate: Tropical climate with consistent temperatures above 60°F (16°C) and high humidity
prerequisites.pollination: Bananas are typically propagated by rhizomes, so pollination is not a concern for fruit production.
prerequisites.space: Sufficient space for plant growth, typically 6-10 feet apart for planting.
